item.description: Gabe Nespoli PhD Candidate pdf | cv gabenespoli@gmail.com www.gabenespoli.com linkedin.com/in/gabenespoli github.com/gabenespoli Toronto, Ontario, Canada Skills: data analysis, machine learning, signal processing, research design, EEG Tools: MATLAB, Python, R, Shell, Linux, git, vim Work Experience PhD Candidate 2014-2018 | Ryerson University Designs and programs experiments measuring neural (EEG, FFR; BioSemi, Biopac and physiological (SCL, EMG, HR; Biopac) activity Uses signal processing algorithms for analyzing multi-channel biological data (e.
